filter.name: SuppressWithNearbyCommentFilter
filter.description: A Tag holds a suppression comment and its location. <EOF>

property.name: commentFormat
property.description: Specify comment pattern to trigger filter to begin suppression.

property.name: idFormat
property.description: Specify check ID pattern to suppress.

property.name: influenceFormat
property.description: Specify negative/zero/positive value that defines the number of lines preceding/at/following the suppression comment.

property.name: checkCPP
property.description: Control whether to check C++ style comments ({@code //}).

property.name: checkC
property.description: Control whether to check C style comments ({@code /* ... */}).
